lore: Shot after shot bounces from the indomitable plate of Tor Garadonâ€™s Gravis armour as he advances across the battlefield. Sharp-minded and possessing a knack for improvised warfare, Garadon directs the lethal fire of his warriors through a combination of natural skill and the advanced targeting data fed to him by his signum array.

otherAbilities.name: Signum Array:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

otherAbilities.name: Siege Captain:
otherAbilities.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a MONSTER , VEHICLE , or FORTIFICATION unit, improve the Strength, Armour Penetration and Damage characteristics of that attack by 2.
